text: She rose to stardom as a young parent on MTV ’ s hit series 16 and Pregnant, but now is taking over the spotlight for her new slimmed - down figure. Amber Portwood showed off her impressive weight loss journey via Twitter on Monday, just in time before the sixth season debuts of Teen Mom OG.
